title: Kylie Jenner Hints She's Getting Back Together With Travis Scott
text:
Kylie Jenner may have just revealed that she and Travis Scott have reconciled.

The "KUWTK" star shared a video of their daughter, Stormi, dancing to a remix of Kylie's "Rise and Shine" but it's the caption that's really telling.

Related:

Khloé Kardashian Goes Wild With 'Cub' True in Matching Leopard-Inspired Outfits

Kim Kardashian Accused Of Disrespecting Japanese Culture With Kimono Shapewear Line

Kim Kardashian Shares North West in 'Fur,' Shuts Down Haters in the Process

Kim Kardashian Revealed How Her Fancy Bathroom Sinks Work

Jordyn Woods Lashes Out After Blow-Up with Kardashians: 'It's Been Real'

View photos

The Internet is generating memes of Kylie singing the three words to their one-year-old after a nap the other day.

Stormi is dancing to the remix before she begs Mommy to turn it off and play one of Daddy's songs.

"daddy's girls," she captioned the video.

Girls, as in plural.

Daddy's Girls?!

View photos

The video of Stormi is pretty adorable.

Their tiny tot is dancing in the living room holding onto an iPhone and letting loose to the remix.

Out of nowhere, she starts asking, "daddy sing?" That's when Kylie responds, "No baby, that's mommy! Mommy's singing."

Over and over Stormi demands "Daddy sing" before passing the phone to Kylie.

Back Together?

View photos

Her "daddy girls" comment is raising tons of eyebrows since the duo split earlier this month.
description: Are Kylie and Travis back together?
